scenes.description: Gura Gawr is talking to her audience about how awkward she is and asks Red Gura to take over. She then starts an encore chant to transition into the final song.
Gura and Red Gura perform the song 'SHINKIRO' together on a raft in the middle of the ocean.
Gura Gawr concludes her 2023 birthday stream, thanking her fans and the staff, and hinting at future 3D events.

subtitles.original: ...us together.
subtitles.english: ...us together.

subtitles.original: God, I'm so awkward. Maybe you should take over, Red Gura...
subtitles.english: God, I'm so awkward. Maybe you should take over, Red Gura...

subtitles.original: ...'cause then maybe you won't be as awkward as I am. This is painful. Okay.
subtitles.english: ...'cause then maybe you won't be as awkward as I am. This is painful. Okay.

subtitles.original: We're going to go ahead... We're going to go ahead and then sing something.
subtitles.english: We're going to go ahead... We're going to go ahead and then sing something.

subtitles.original: We'll figure it out behind the scenes, 'cause I don't... I know what we're going to sing.
subtitles.english: We'll figure it out behind the scenes, 'cause I don't... I know what we're going to sing.

subtitles.original: I know exactly what we're going to sing.
subtitles.english: I know exactly what we're going to sing.

subtitles.original: Okay. You ready, Gur?
subtitles.english: Okay. You ready, Gur?

subtitles.original: Gur... uh... Okay, she's ready.
subtitles.english: Gur... uh... Okay, she's ready.

subtitles.original: All right. Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore!
subtitles.english: All right. Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore!

subtitles.original: Encore!
subtitles.english: Encore!

subtitles.original: Always keep your eyes on the line of the horizon.
subtitles.english: Always keep your eyes on the line of the horizon.

subtitles.original: Come on, chumbuds, climb on board and celebrate our days.
subtitles.english: Come on, chumbuds, climb on board and celebrate our days.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Waves will knock you down, and currents pull you out, ah-ah.
subtitles.english: Waves will knock you down, and currents pull you out, ah-ah.

subtitles.original: Life hits you with the ocean...
subtitles.english: Life hits you with the ocean...

subtitles.original: Tryna make a splash, but every stream is crashed, oh no!
subtitles.english: Tryna make a splash, but every stream is crashed, oh no!

subtitles.original: But still we keep on swimming!
subtitles.english: But still we keep on swimming!

subtitles.original: It's almost time, just give me a sec.
subtitles.english: It's almost time, just give me a sec.

subtitles.original: A thousand years to hook in a net...
subtitles.english: A thousand years to hook in a net...

subtitles.original: With a hand to hold, we're not alone.
subtitles.english: With a hand to hold, we're not alone.

subtitles.original: Got a high of go then head above... no wait...
subtitles.english: Got a high of go then head above... no wait...

subtitles.original: The fun's just begun, being hydro-dynamic is just more fun!
subtitles.english: The fun's just begun, being hydro-dynamic is just more fun!

subtitles.original: So hang on, 'cause the water's dropped, here we go, down, down, down!
subtitles.english: So hang on, 'cause the water's dropped, here we go, down, down, down!

subtitles.original: Come sail away with me!
subtitles.english: Come sail away with me!

subtitles.original: Our future's beyond the sea, the sun rise shine on our lives.
subtitles.english: Our future's beyond the sea, the sun rise shine on our lives.

subtitles.original: This old dream we carry each.
subtitles.english: This old dream we carry each.

subtitles.original: So no matter how we grow...
subtitles.english: So no matter how we grow...

subtitles.original: ...just always know.
subtitles.english: ...just always know.

subtitles.original: Always keep your eyes on the line of the horizon.
subtitles.english: Always keep your eyes on the line of the horizon.

subtitles.original: Come on, chumbuds, climb on board and celebrate our days!
subtitles.english: Come on, chumbuds, climb on board and celebrate our days!

subtitles.original: Okay, everybody, that's it for...
subtitles.english: Okay, everybody, that's it for...

subtitles.original: ...my birthday stream of 2023! Pew! Woohoo! Yeah!
subtitles.english: ...my birthday stream of 2023! Pew! Woohoo! Yeah!

subtitles.original: I hope you enjoyed your time today with me.
subtitles.english: I hope you enjoyed your time today with me.

subtitles.original: Thank you very much for spending time with me and for saying hey after all this time.
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for spending time with me and for saying hey after all this time.

subtitles.original: I really appreciate it.
subtitles.english: I really appreciate it.

subtitles.original: I hope you had fun. I hope you were entertained...
subtitles.english: I hope you had fun. I hope you were entertained...

subtitles.original: ...even just a little bit. I hope... I hope your days are going well and your...
subtitles.english: ...even just a little bit. I hope... I hope your days are going well and your...

subtitles.original: ...your life is going well, honestly.
subtitles.english: ...your life is going well, honestly.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much again for the support.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much again for the support.

subtitles.original: I hope you enjoyed everything that I've shown you today.
subtitles.english: I hope you enjoyed everything that I've shown you today.

subtitles.original: Huge thanks to everybody that has helped to make today's stream possible.
subtitles.english: Huge thanks to everybody that has helped to make today's stream possible.

subtitles.original: Thank you very much. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you very much. Thank you, thank you, thank you.

subtitles.original: And thank you to Manessan as well for helping me through all of this. I really appreciated it.
subtitles.english: And thank you to Manessan as well for helping me through all of this. I really appreciated it.

subtitles.original: We have more fun stuff coming in the summer.
subtitles.english: We have more fun stuff coming in the summer.

subtitles.original: It's a big summer, you guys. I hope you're strapped in and ready.
subtitles.english: It's a big summer, you guys. I hope you're strapped in and ready.

subtitles.original: Strap in, buttercups. It's going to be a big one.
subtitles.english: Strap in, buttercups. It's going to be a big one.

subtitles.original: I'm very excited, and you should be too.
subtitles.english: I'm very excited, and you should be too.

subtitles.original: Yahoo!
subtitles.english: Yahoo!

subtitles.original: Also, there might be another bigger Gumba 3D live on the horizon...
subtitles.english: Also, there might be another bigger Gumba 3D live on the horizon...

subtitles.original: ...mmm, perhaps? Mmm, perhaps? It'll probably be quite a bit of ways from now...
subtitles.english: ...mmm, perhaps? Mmm, perhaps? It'll probably be quite a bit of ways from now...

subtitles.original: ...but just so you know, just another thing to look forward to.
subtitles.english: ...but just so you know, just another thing to look forward to.

subtitles.original: Wahoo! Yippee-yippee-yippee!
subtitles.english: Wahoo! Yippee-yippee-yippee!

subtitles.original: Thank you though, guys. I'm excited.
subtitles.english: Thank you though, guys. I'm excited.

subtitles.original: Thank you as always. Thank you for everything. Thank you as always and forever.
subtitles.english: Thank you as always. Thank you for everything. Thank you as always and forever.

subtitles.original: Um, I'll see you around, okay?
subtitles.english: Um, I'll see you around, okay?

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday to me and to any of you if it's your birthday!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday to me and to any of you if it's your birthday!

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday. I'm sweating.
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday. I'm sweating.

subtitles.original: Thank you, guys. I hope you have a lovely day. I will see you...
subtitles.english: Thank you, guys. I hope you have a lovely day. I will see you...

subtitles.original: I'll see you... trying to think of like a fun ocean word.
subtitles.english: I'll see you... trying to think of like a fun ocean word.

subtitles.original: I'll see you in the, in the... ocean. I'll see you...
subtitles.english: I'll see you in the, in the... ocean. I'll see you...

subtitles.original: I'll swim by!
subtitles.english: I'll swim by!
